Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.


Home

About

Tags

Feed

APIs.json

    Traffic Volume Counts (2014-2019)

    Traffic volume counts collected by DOT for New York Metropolitan Transportation Council (NYMTC) to validate the New York Best Practice Model (NYBPM).

    Traffic Volume Counts (2012-2013)

    Traffic volume counts collected by DOT for New York Metropolitan Transportation Council (NYMTC) to validate the New York Best Practice Model (NYBPM).

    Traffic volume counts collected by DOT for New York Metropolitan Transportation Council (NYMTC) to validate the New York Best Practice Model (NYBPM).

    Traffic Volume Counts (2011-2012)

    Traffic volume counts collected by DOT for New York Metropolitan Transportation Council (NYMTC) to validate the New York Best Practice Model (NYBPM).

    Traffic Volume Counts (2011-2012)

    Traffic volume counts collected by DOT for New York Metropolitan Transportation Council (NYMTC) to validate the New York Best Practice Model (NYBPM).

    Traffic Signal and All-Way Stop Study Requests

    Tracking system for the Traffic Operations Division to service studies related to the traffic signals and their maintenance.

    Tourism Grants

    This list contains information on tourism grants

    Total SNAP Recipients

    Monthly trend statistics on SNAP supplemental nutrition assistance program recipients.

    Total HASA Cases

    Total number of HASA cases.

    Topographical Bureau Maps

    This list contains information on maps maintained by the topographical bureau

    A list of the final section maps that would show the legal street information for Borough of Brooklyn.
